xwikidoc.title: Logic test: Smoking
xwikidoc.content: {{info}}A clinical trial monitored two sets of initially healthy patients, one smokers and the other non-smokers. After 15 years, in both groups 0.12% of the patients had cancer, thus the logical conclusion is that smoking doesn't cause cancer. Is this correct?{{/info}}
